events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred last night involving a collision with a tree on Elm Street.
The claim was reviewed and classified under Auto Accident based on incident details and keywords in the report.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the customer's vehicle collision claim and initiate next steps.
Customer received official acknowledgment of the claim submission and was informed about the process timeline.
Requested the police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the damaged car for detailed processing.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including the accident report and damaged vehicle images.
Claim investigation initiated by verifying submitted documents and assessing the collision details.
Investigation concluded confirming the collision was accidental with no liability disputes.
Settlement offer presented to the customer covering repair costs and associated vehicle damages.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement proposal and the overall claim handling.
Claim approval confirmed by the insurance company authorizing payment for repairs and damage coverage.
Payment disbursed to the customerâ€™s repair shop for the vehicle damages caused in the collision.
The auto accident claim was formally closed following successful settlement and payment issuance.
All case documents and communications related to the vehicle accident claim have been archived securely.
